author: Peter H
title: An oasis in St Germain
text:
We have stayed at the Madison three times and have always found it reliable. The rooms are clean and well appointed. The staff are friendly and responsive. It isn't cheap but you get what you pay for. We love St. Germain and there is good shopping and great local restaurants nearby. Highly recommend the neighborhood. The hotel is right behind the Metro so very convenient - 20 minutes from Gare du Nord.
